title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the pasta until al dente.
Fry the bacon until crispy.
Whisk eggs and cheese together.
Combine everything and season with pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Grilled chicken cooked in creamy tomato sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Grill the chicken until charred.
Cook tomato puree with spices.
Add cream and mix with chicken.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy vegetable stir fry with soy sauce.
instructions: Heat oil in a wok.
Add garlic and ginger, sauté for a minute.
Add vegetables and stir fry until tender.
Add soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic cookies loaded with chocolate chips.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix dry ingredients together.
Cream butter and sugars, then add eggs.
Combine wet and dry ingredients, fold in chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls onto baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A fresh salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Chop the romaine lettuce.
Toss with croutons and Caesar dressing.
Top with grated Parmesan cheese.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Tasty beef tacos with fresh toppings.
instructions: Cook ground beef with taco seasoning.
Fill taco shells with beef and desired toppings.
